item.title: Shell Commands
item.description: General # switch user su some-user-name execute previous command !! List file system mounts findmnt Filter results awk '/search_pattern/ {print $2 $1}' $1 refers to column 1 & $2 refers to column 2, starting from index 0 Search # Find File find path_to_search -name "*.txt" -not to inverse results -maxdepth some_int to limit depth of search -size +1M find files larger than 1 MB -type f|d find files or directories `-exec grep -n -i “foo” Grep grep -i "string_to_be_searched" path_to_search
